Release Name: elftosb
Release Version: 5.1.19
Package License: LA_OPT_NXP_Software_License.htm - Production Use, Section 2.3 applies

Host tools Source          Description: Source code for elftosb                                      
                           Author: Freescale                                 
                           License: Open Source - BSD-3-Clause               
                           Format: source code                               
                           Location: proj/elftosb                    

Host tools - options       Description: Command line parsing utility         
support                    Author: bradapp@enteract.com                      
                           License: Open Source - MIT                        
                           URL: http://www.bradapp.com                       
                           Format: source code                               
                           Location:
                           proj/elftosb/common/options.h,                                           
                           proj/elftosb/common/options.cpp

Host tools - SHA-1         Description: Implementation of the SHA-1 algorithm
                           Author: Dominik Reichl                            
                           <dominik.reichl@t-online.de>                      
                           License: Public Domain                            
                           URL: http://www.dominik-reichl.de/                
                           Format: source code                               
                           Location:                                         
                           proj/elftosb/common/SHA1.h,                                              
                           proj/elftosb/common/SHA1.cpp                                             

Host tools - Rijndael      Description: C++ interface to the Vincent Rijmen's
                           Rijndael block cipher                             
                           Author: Szymon Stefanek (stefanek@tin.it)         
                           License: Public Domain                            
                           Format: source code
                           Location: 
                           proj/elftosb/common/rijndael.h,                                              
                           proj/elftosb/common/rijndael.cpp                                             

Host tools - Flex          Description: Fast lexical analyzer generator.
                           License: Open Source - BSD-2-Clause    
                           URL: https://github.com/westes/flex                        
                           Format: source code
                           Location: 
                           proj/elftosb/common/FlexLex.h                                             
                                           
mbedtls                    Description: Cryptographic and SSL/TLS Library    
                           Author: ARM                                       
                           License: Apache-2.0                               
                           name: MBED TLS stack                              
                           URL: https://tls.mbed.org/                    
                           version: 2.3.0                                    
                           Format: source code                               
                           Location:                                         
                           proj/elftosb/mbedtls
